# Body

**Associated Type**

The type of commands that represents the body of this command hierarchy.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype Body : Commands
```

## Discussion

When you create custom commands, Swift infers this type from your implementation of the required [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Commands/body-swift.property] property.

## Implementing commands

- **body**: The contents of the command hierarchy.
